line.comment: * the Nomad faction consumes an abstracted resource that they get when refugees reach their flagship
* random chance to save up more special Nomad resources
* up to 1 recycler for each 5 sectors in the galaxy. up to 5 traders per recycler
* at least 1 recycler in the galaxy
* chance to build mercs gets higher when enough recyclers and traders exist

sval.val: the Nomad faction consumes an abstracted resource that they get when refugees reach their flagship
random chance to save up more special Nomad resources
up to 1 recycler for each 5 sectors in the galaxy. up to 5 traders per recycler
at least 1 recycler in the galaxy
chance to build mercs gets higher when enough recyclers and traders exist
